title: Instagram : number of brand sponsored influencer posts 2016 to 2020
summary: This statistic presents the number of pubs , bars and nightclubs in the United Kingdom ( uk ) from 2015 to 2021 . According to the figures as of 2019 , it can be seen that the number of online transactions was forecasted to increase from approximately 1.18 million in 2018 to a total of 1.3 million by the year 2022 . These figures would lead to an average of 1.21 million transactions per annum between the years 2018 and 2022 .
gold: This statistic presents the number of brand sponsored influencer posts on Instagram from 2016 to 2020 . In 2018 , there were 3.7 million brand sponsored influencer posts on the social platform . The volume of sponsored content on Instagram is projected to amount to 4.95 million posts in 2019 .
